CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 12, 1941, pg. 12 reads: "Courier Cameras Click As Colorful Eastern Open Unfolds On South Park's Beautiful Golf Course...5. J. C. Hamilton, the long-driving Homestead Grays pitcher who finished in second place....Harris and staff photographers."
TitMainTitle: J. C. Hamilton holding golf club on South Park golf course for Eastern Open
